column4: hello....im trying to install 6.06 and i have a 76 gb partition open...so i set 75 gb to the install partition and the remaining gb to swap...except when i have to choose where to install it and the swap drive, it only recognizes the partition as a whole?
you set all that in the desktop installer?
did you write the changes to disk before exiting the partitioner?
are you still in the installer now?
